articles.author: Alice French, Kanoko Matsuyama, Lisa Pham
articles.title: Asia’s Pharma Stocks Drop as Trump Plans US Drug Price Cuts - Bloomberg
articles.description: Shares of pharmaceutical companies fell across the world after US President Donald Trump said he planned to order a cut in US prescription drug costs to bring them in line with other countries, prompting concern that profits will take a hit.
